name: Dapper Dude With A Defective Gun
name_original: Dapper Dude With A Defective Gun
description:
This game is a battle arena, enemies will spawn periodically.

Avoid the enemies and the dangerously spinning cogs 

YOUR job is to avoid them and use movement and your defective steampowered gun to push them into the cogs. 

SURVIVE for 3 minutes to attain glory!

Controls:

Use wasd for moving the player

Use the mouse to aim

You cannot manually fire the gun, it will fire on its own when the pressure gets too high!

Sound assets have been taken from:

https://audiograb.com/F8hrslzD

https://freesound.org/
